DOC.brief_summary: The objective study demonstrate ability Hydrus Implant low intraocular pressure glaucoma patient undergo cataract surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Trial Evaluate Hydrus ( TM ) Implant Subjects Undergoing Cataract Surgery .
DOC.detailed_description: This post-market , prospective , single-masked , randomize , control , multicenter clinical trial compare Cataract Extraction ( CE ) surgery + Hydrus Implant v CE surgery alone reduction intraocular pressure ( IOP ) patient positive diagnosis open angle glaucoma ( POAG ) pseudoexfoliative glaucoma . Eligible patient schedule cataract surgery . At time procedure , qualified subject randomize 1 2 treatment group : Hydrus Implant cataract surgery cataract surgery alone . Post-operative follow conduct regular interval .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Primary Open Angle Glaucoma Pseudoexfoliative Glaucoma . Operable , agerelated cataract eligible phacoemulsification . Closed Angle narrow angle form Glaucoma . Other Secondary Glaucoma , ( neovascular , uveitic , traumatic , steroid induce , lens induce ) ; glaucoma associate increase episcleral venous pressure ; congenital developmental glaucoma .
